title: Case-Based Collaborative Instructional Design Competency Enhancement Program for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and mathematics subject matter knowledge
context.additional_context: Applying the 6-stage DAISI model using smartphone-based VR simulations

learning_goals: Preservice teachers can analyze real-world math lesson scenarios and develop instructional designs following the six-step DAISI model.
Learners can improve draft instructional designs by at least 80% by incorporating peer feedback during collaborative learning.
Participants can execute 15-minute simulated lessons by applying teaching methods designed in a VR simulation environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
